basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Mike Knight Endowed Scholarship in Psychology
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - PSY - Dr. Mike Knight Scholarship Committee

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in Psychology. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student in the psychology program 3.25 GPA or higher Enrolled in 9 credit hours or more Submission of a personal introspective paper entitled, "What I would do for free" Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
